1 Open the program ...

Note: usually it is in inicar / programs / Tools ... Easy RealMedia.
Choose "Tools Easy RealMedia Producer V1.83" ...

     2 - Click on "Settings"

     3 - Check "Use CBR" option and enter "400" Kbs ...

Note: the higher the kbs ... higher the quality and size of the movie!

     4th - On "Video Code", enter "RealVideo10"

     5 Ã‚Â° - And check the option under Video Code ... The "FPS" and enter "23"!

     6 - Now click on "R10 / 9 Settings" ... is right on top!

     7 - In "Use Two Pass" load only "1st pass" ...

Note: this will cause the program to convert the movie with a single pass, otherwise it will read the film twice and it does take more conversion!

     8 - Click "OK"

     9 - Click On "SaveAsDef" and then "Ok"

     Rename the file after converting to the end .rmvb ready!
